response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and engineered to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This product is not just an item; it's a solution tailored to enhance efficiency and productivity in your operations. Given its exceptional capabilities and the unique features it offers, we believe its value exceeds $800,000 to us. Considering its immense potential impact on your business, we are offering it to you at this exclusive price. We understand that the value of this product might be perceived differently based on your specific needs and objectives. Therefore, if you're interested in exploring how this product can benefit your company, please let us know, and we can discuss further details. We look forward to the possibility of working with you and contributing to your success.", "product_price": 800000}
